channel.title: Some help with a bit of code[SOLVED with code for those who need it]

item.title: Some help with a bit of code[SOLVED with code for those who need it]
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

As of right now im trying to find the axe that is closest to the players level and i have no idea how to do that

a simple example would be 4 numbers

10, 15, 25, 35, and the player level is 30

how could i find out a way to analyze the 4 ints and find which is closest to 30

EDIT: since they are in order and you have the axe and the level the last integers returned must be the best axe.

This is the code.

[code=java]
private static int[][] AXE_DATA = {
//axeId, axe anim, axe level req, bonus stat
{1351, 1, 879, 0}, //Bronze
{1349, 1, 877, 1}, //Iron
{1353, 6, 875, 2}, //Steel
{1361, 6, 873, 3}, //Black
{1355, 21, 871, 4}, //Mithril
{1357, 31, 869, 5}, //Addy
{1359, 41, 867, 6}, //Rune
};

private static void handlePlayerAxe(Client client) {
for(int i = 0; i < AXE_DATA.length; i++) {
if(client.getItems().playerHasItem(AXE_DATA[i][0])) {
if(client.playerLevel[8] >= AXE_DATA[i][1]) {
axeAnim = AXE_DATA[i][2];
axeBonus = AXE_DATA[i][3];
client.playerHasAxe = true;
}
}
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
